channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: The Travel Show
channel.desc: Fifty years after Spain began the transition to democracy, The Travel Show heads to Catalonia, a region that is fiercely proud of its traditions and often has a complicated relationship with the government in Madrid. Starting in Barcelona, Emeline Nsingi Nkosi discovers how the local football club plays a huge role in defining Catalan identity before heading to the countryside to see how a new generation are keeping centuries-old customs alive.
